attributes.action: Reform the criminal justice system & all police forces & social services
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the whole criminal justice system to be reformed & all police forces 

Over 70,00 rapes get reported every year & there is only 2% that go to court
This is absolutely disgusting & our children futures, & our children safety is at risk I’m scared of having kids myself because of world we live in
I want more prisons built, as it’s disgusting you’re rejecting to have rapists go to prison it’s disgusting & this is England and I’m not proud of my country or government!
attributes.background:
, the criminal system, and the social system is failed so many people. 

Police forces is failing to tackle child grooming and & other sexual offences, failing thousands of victims, every year.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you are concerned about the police and social services' involvement in sexual offence cases, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We also require petitioners to give their full name to start a petition.

If you want to start a new petition you'll need to provide your full name.
